articles.title: Strawberry Moon 2025: 11 beautiful photos of June's special Moon from around the World
articles.description: From London’s skyline to ancient temples in Greece, the Strawberry Moon 2025 cast a magical glow across the globe. These 11 stunning photos capture the lunar beauty as seen from different corners of the world.
articles.content:
1/10 Turkey Full Moon: The Strawberry Moon rises behind Istanbul’s Galata Tower on Wednesday, 11 June 2025. (Image: AP)
